p: A similar analysis based on the HAV sequences from Lazio region and sequences from another European country experiencing a contemporary AHA outbreak [ 55], based on a shorter (319 bp) overlapping VP1X2A junction region, showed that, indeed, the same HAV IA epidemic strains, i.e. VRD_521_2016,RIVM-HAV16-090 were mainly involved in the contemporary outbreak in Italy, Lazio and Spain, Barcelona ( S3 Fig).
